name: Octopi Attack!
description:
Octopi Attack! is new twist on the brick breaking classic: Breakout. Octopodes have invaded your friendly neighbourhood reef and you must fight to protect yourself! In this game you use a paddle to shield your delicate body from oncoming octopi shell attacks while fighting back by bouncing a ball to destroy the evil octopuses.

Controls:

Start/ Restart game : Spacebar 

Move Left/ Right: Left and right arrow keys

Game Sprite sources:

Blobfish

Breakout Bricks by imaginelabs

Shell

Underwater Background

Octopus by AntumDeluge
